nodes.text: The Grand Aratech Gravidome was a structure on the planet Coruscant. In 7944 C.R.C., Zugga Entertainment attempted to open a podracing course in the Gravidome; however, ultimately it did not go through with the project. Zugga Entertainment's plans led Coruscant Security Force Lieutenant Tanivos Divo to compile a large case file on podracing and his grandson Exantor Divo—who published portions of his grandfather's case files—commented that this attention from the police was likely why the project was abandoned.
The Grand Aratech Gravidome was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
